Aug. 19, 1922 D South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association (B Section)
South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association (B Section) 20 Test Piece Contest South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association south-wales-monmouthshire-brass-band-association-b
Caemawr Park, Porth, Glamorgan March contest - 1st Treharris, 2nd Great Western Colliery. 4 bands competed.
Feb. 14, 2016, 1:24 p.m. Feb. 20, 2017, 7:02 p.m.

2 Dowlais Town T. G. Moore
